artifactchecker-maven-plugin Maven Mojo

artifactchecker-maven-plugin Maven Mojo
Project Documentation
  • Project Information
  • Project Reports

artifactchecker:check-artifactId

Full name:

net.batmat.maven.plugins:artifactchecker-maven-plugin:0.1-SNAPSHOT:check-artifactId

Description:

Simple goal that will check if your project folder has the same name as the current project artifactId.

Attributes:

  • Requires a Maven project to be executed.

Optional Parameters

Name Type Since Description
absoluteBaseDirectory String - (no description)
Default value is: ${basedir}.
artifactId String - (no description)
Default value is: ${project.artifactId}.

Parameter Details

absoluteBaseDirectory:

(no description)
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • Default: ${basedir}

artifactId:

(no description)
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • Default: ${project.artifactId}
